channel.title: Start new Game in Questionable Ethics?
channel.description:
Hi there,
I'm out of town for a week, and forgot to bring my Black Mesa savegame files with me. Does anyone know what I need to do to start a new game at the beginning of Questionable Ethics?
I'm familiar with sv_cheats, but I don't know the command to load a map, weapons, etc, and I'm having trouble finding them.
Thanks!

item.title: Start new Game in Questionable Ethics?
item.dc:creator: warpedfreeman
item.description:
just open the Dev console and type Sv_unlockedchapters “11” that will unlock all chapters to QE

Read full topic
item.source: Start new Game in Questionable Ethics?

item.title: Start new Game in Questionable Ethics?
item.dc:creator: Keresh
item.description:
c2a4e-f is questionable ethics. So command “map c2a4e” should place you at the beginning of that chapter.

Read full topic
item.source: Start new Game in Questionable Ethics?

item.title: Start new Game in Questionable Ethics?
item.dc:creator: modehead
item.description:
What are the map names? I’m having trouble finding them.

Read full topic
item.source: Start new Game in Questionable Ethics?

item.title: Start new Game in Questionable Ethics?
item.dc:creator: modehead
item.source: Start new Game in Questionable Ethics?

item.title: Start new Game in Questionable Ethics?
item.dc:creator: Mont_Blanc
item.description:
It works only if you reached this chapter with the game before. Otherwise if it’s a brand new BM install, you’ll be forced to start at the beginning.

EDIT :ninja: by my bro

Read full topic
item.source: Start new Game in Questionable Ethics?

item.title: Start new Game in Questionable Ethics?
item.dc:creator: Keresh
item.description:
Actually, he’s wrong. You need to use the “map” command. When you have a new install you can only start the chapters you’ve previously unlocked, but without the saves they will all be locked.

Read full topic
item.source: Start new Game in Questionable Ethics?

item.title: Start new Game in Questionable Ethics?
item.dc:creator: modehead
item.description:
GordonFreedman:

Easy, brotha. All you need to do i think iz hit “New game” then pick that chappie.

Thanks. Sorry for teh dumb post. BM is downloading now and I wanted to figure this out during the DL.

Also, thanks for not being an asshole about a dumb question.

Read full topic
